statements: SELECT * FROM government_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_type, regulatory_body FROM government_regulations;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_regulations WHERE incentive_available = TRUE;
SELECT regulation_description FROM government_regulations WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_type, regulatory_body FROM government_regulations ORDER BY regulation_type DESC, regulatory_body ASC;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description FROM government_regulations WHERE incentive_available = TRUE ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_type, incentive_available FROM government_regulations WHERE regulation_type = 'Environmental' ORDER BY regulation_name;
SELECT * FROM government_regulations WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND incentive_available = TRUE ORDER BY regulation_id;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM government_regulations WHERE regulatory_body LIKE 'Federal%' ORDER BY regulatory_body, regulation_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT regulation_type FROM government_regulations ORDER BY regulation_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_title, regulation_description FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE incentive_amount > 1000;
SELECT incentive_title, incentive_type, incentive_amount FROM incentives WHERE incentive_type = 'Cash' ORDER BY incentive_amount ASC;
SELECT regulation_title, regulation_date FROM regulations WHERE regulation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_title, regulation_date FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE incentive_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY incentive_amount DESC;
SELECT regulation_title, regulation_date FROM regulations WHERE regulation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT incentive_title, incentive_type, incentive_amount FROM incentives WHERE incentive_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM regulations JOIN incentives ON regulations.regulation_id = incentives.incentive_id;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status='COMPLIED';
SELECT * FROM incentives ORDER BY incentive_amount DESC;
SELECT incentive_name, incentive_type, incentive_amount FROM incentives WHERE incentive_type='TAX_CREDIT';
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations ORDER BY compliance_status DESC, regulation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE incentive_type = 'TAX_CREDIT';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM energy_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.regulation_name, i.incentive_name, e.project_name FROM regulations r JOIN energy_projects e ON r.regulation_id = e.regulation_id JOIN incentives i ON e.incentive_id = i.incentive_id;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM regulations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT incentive_name, incentive_type, incentive_description FROM incentives WHERE incentive_type = 'Financial';
SELECT company_name, industry_type FROM companies WHERE industry_type IN ('Tech', 'Finance');
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE source_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY source_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, industry_type FROM companies WHERE industry_type = 'Technology';
SELECT incentive_name, incentive_type FROM incentives ORDER BY incentive_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE source_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY source_capacity DESC;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM companies WHERE company_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM Regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Regulations WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry, region FROM Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT contact_name, email FROM Contacts WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM Projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM Regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, start_date, end_date FROM Regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Incentives WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, region FROM Companies WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
